name: KIT109 Exam Game 2021
description:
2021 Exam Game For UTAS Kit109. 

How to Play::

Click the buttons at the bottom to move your pumpkin dude, and attempt to return to mother pumpkin. Beware, as you only get one of each move listed at the bottom of the screen in each level.

1-9 to select levels, ESC to return to title.

Difficulties: Easy (infinite lives), Medium (3 lives, can regen), Hard (3 lives total).

References

Script from Brackeys: https://github.com/Brackeys/2D-Character-Controller

Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Fredoka+One#standard-styles

Art from Cainos:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/pixel-art-icon-pack-rpg-15834...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-top-down-basic-1...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-platformer-villa...
